hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn Abbas said:"The Messenger of Allah and his Companions came on the morning of the fourth day (of Dhul-Hijjah), reciting the Talbiyah for Hajj, and the Messenger of commanded them to exit Ihram

chapter.ara-name: باب الْوَقْتِ الَّذِي وَافَى فِيهِ النَّبِيُّ صلى الله عليه وسلم مَكَّةَ
chapter.eng-name: The Time When The Prophet (ﷺ) Arrived In Makkah
